definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: The thief walked out of the gallery with the picture underneath his painter's smock.
sentences.chinese: 他把畫藏在了漆工的工作服下然後把它帶出了畫廊。

sentences.english: Some of the men have only recently swapped their weapons for blue overalls and yellow hard hats.
sentences.chinese: 他們中一些人最近才換上了藍色工作服和黃色安全帽。

sentences.english: The Times staff changed quickly into coveralls.
sentences.chinese: 《時代》雜誌人員很快地換上了工作服。

sentences.english: Browse or Buy our Dickies Workwear Today.
sentences.chinese: 瀏覽或購買我們的迪基斯工作服今天。

sentences.english: Upon exiting the break room, put on work shoes and boots and coveralls , if needed.
sentences.chinese: 走出休息室後，有必要的話應該穿上工作靴和工作服。

sentences.english: She put on some overalls, GOT out the paint and started on the living-room wall.
sentences.chinese: 她穿上工作服，拿出油漆，從起居室的牆開始幹起來。

sentences.english: She took off the smock and stood there in a bright green slip.
sentences.chinese: 她脫下工作服，穿上一件鮮綠色調的襯裙站在那裏。

sentences.english: Wearing overalls on weekdays, painting somebody else's house to earn money?
sentences.chinese: 平日穿着工作服靠幫別人粉刷房子賺錢？

sentences.english: White-smocked civilian health officials are also out spraying.
sentences.chinese: 穿着白色工作服的健康中心的官員也正在外面噴霧。

sentences.english: Browse or Buy Hi-Vis Workwear Today.
sentences.chinese: 瀏覽或購買高可見工作服今天。

sentences.english: Your smock is so dirty that you should wash it.
sentences.chinese: 你的工作服很髒所以你應該把它洗乾淨。

sentences.english: He then changed into overalls and spent the next eight hours as a dustman.
sentences.chinese: 然後他換上工作服，做八小時清潔工。

sentences.english: Why don’t you get dressed now? put on your work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼現在還不穿衣服，穿上你的工作服吧？

sentences.english: Western styles have become the standard mode of work dress for men, signifying modernity.
sentences.chinese: 西裝成爲男人工作服的標準模式，標誌着現代化。

sentences.english: Just now he turns up his nose at overalls .
sentences.chinese: 目前他還看不上工作服。

definition: to subdue/to check/to bring under control/(in former times) what one is allowed to wear depending on social status/uniform (army, party, school etc)/livery (for company employees)/CL:套[tao4]
